name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81907
title: MongoDB must provide a warning to appropriate support staff when allocated audit
script:
auditlog="auditlog.destination"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
    log=$(grep -i "${auditlog}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#" | grep -i "file")
    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "$auditlog is not set to file within $checkfile"
       exit 0
    else
       echo "$auditlog is set to file within $checkfile"
       exit 1
    fi
    else
       echo "$checkfile does not exist"
       exit 1
    fi
